text: <#C689Y34LE|gpu> or <#C7LFJTXV5|flux-bridged> is the better place for these questions. Short answer no, but I'm sure AMDGPU.jl would welcome it if someone wrapped MIOpen. Also there's the question of getting a supported GPU in the first place, since the last 2 generations of consumer cards are _not_ supported yet by any ML framework because AMD hasn't implemented the required ROCm components for them.
